schema.name: S&r Meets Healthyfied

recipeInstructions.text: Wash the tomatoes, broccoli, and capsicums under cold water.
Chop the tomatoes, broccoli, capsicum green, and red capsicum into bite-sized pieces.
Grill the quarter pound beef patty according to your preference, usually taking about 4-6 minutes for a medium-cook.
As the beef patty cooks, prepare the tuna wrap by gently heating it on a pan for about 2 minutes, being careful not to dry it out.
Assemble your dish by placing the grilled beef patty and tuna wrap on a plate.
Surround the patty and wrap with the freshly chopped tomatoes, broccoli, and capsicums.

schema.description: Dive into the world of healthy eating without sacrificing taste with our 'S&r Meets Healthyfied' recipe. Perfect for those who are looking for high-protein and high-fiber options, this recipe combines the goodness of fresh vegetables like broccoli, capsicum, and tomatoes with the hearty satisfaction of a quarter pound beef patty and a tuna wrap. It's a unique blend that brings together health and flavor in each bite, making it an excellent choice for anyone looking to enjoy healthy recipes without compromise.
